title: T213-1 Coupon Type 1 George Hunter and Owen Wilson for sale
author: Luke

posts.post_title: T213-1 Coupon Type 1 George Hunter and Owen Wilson for sale
posts.post_content:
Prices includes shipping and assumes a no-fee payment method.  PP Goods is fine if you add 3% to the total.  Thanks for looking!


Hunter $395  -  Only 3 graded between SGC and PSA (plus this raw copy)

Wilson $250 - Only 2 graded by SGC, none at PSA  -  I tried to soak this card in warm water, and the paper on back did not want to budge
